column10: This is Operation Command─we see your ship has arrived safely. Welcome to the Diadem!
column11: House Haillenarte has a vested interest in the bounty these isles have to offer. As such, your task this day is to assess the region's natural resources.
column12: Go forth and gather what you may! Provide us with a thorough evaluation, and your diligence shall be duly rewarded.

column10:
Operation Command here.
We have received your preliminary report.
column11: The initial results are certainly promising! Pray continue your survey and inform us of your progress.

column10:
Operation Command here.
We have received your interim report.
column11: Fascinating, but inconclusive. One last round of samples should allow for a more definitive assessment!

column9: Gather over-aspected fire crystals
column10: This is Operation Command─we see your ship has arrived safely. Welcome to the Diadem!
column11: Your task this day is to gather crystals that exhibit excessive elemental properties. Proceed to the delineated area, and secure the shards we seek.
column12: This operation's degree of success will also be gauged by the extent of your explorations. Have at it, adventurers.

column9: Accept the enfeebling elixir from the pilot at the <Emphasis>Bounty</Emphasis>
column10: This is Operation Command─we see your ship has arrived safely. Welcome to the Diadem!
column11: Your task this day will be to field test a new reagent developed to enfeeble the fierce beasts of the Diadem.
column12: First things first! Make your way to the <Emphasis>Bounty</Emphasis> and collect the elixir we have prepared.

column9: Slay silvershells weakened by the enfeebling elixir
column10: Your task now is to test the enfeebling elixir in combat against silvershells.
column11: The exact timing is left to your discretion, but do be sure to use the elixir before the creatures are dead, eh?
column12: This operation's degree of success will also be gauged by the extent of your explorations. Have at it, adventurers.

We have received your preliminary report.
column11: Pray continue with your efforts to lure in and cull the dangerous creatures of the Diadem.
column12: This operation's degree of success will also be gauged by the extent of your explorations. Have at it, adventurers.

column9: Use a scent trap to ambush coelophysis
column10:
Operation Command here.
We have received your interim report.
column11: Slay the next target and your duty is done─move on to the next hunting ground and prepare your trap.
column12: This operation's degree of success will also be gauged by the extent of your explorations. Have at it, adventurers.
